name: Channel Info
description: Calculate characteristics of water flow in a channel from its submerged region

inputs.name: Channel
inputs.description: A closed planar curve representing a section of the water body; assumes a level top

inputs.name: Roughness
inputs.description: Manning's roughness coefficient for the channel

inputs.name: Slope
inputs.description: Slope of the hydraulic grade line as a decimal (i.e. rise/run = 0.5)

outputs.name: Wetted Perimeter
outputs.description: Length of the channel in the boundary

outputs.name: Hydraulic Radius
outputs.description: Ratio of area to wetted perimeter

outputs.name: Velocity
outputs.description: Velocity of the water flow in the channel

outputs.name: Discharge
outputs.description: The rate of discharge in cubic document units per second
